long_description: This large, rectangular polyethylene bottle from Nalgene stacks into spaces other bottles won't-great for boating because it won't roll around! Heavy-duty container won't easily split or puncture like lightweight bottles. Features a wide mouth for easy filling or pouring; ideal for mixing juice concentrate, pancake batter or powdered mixes. Screw-on cap prevents leaks. Polyethylene is 100% BPA free.
short_description: This large, rectangular polyethylene bottle from Nalgene stacks into spaces other bottles won't-great for boating because it won't roll around!
